5/ And last, the fiction they're in can't exist solely for the fake band. Eg. No Ziggy Stardust, no Sgt. Pepper's, no Gorillaz.
4/ 2nd, the band members can't be playing as themselves. Davy Jones, Jack Black & Bret McKenzie exist outside their bands. B-Rabbit doesn't.
3/ First, they have to exist musically‚Äîeg. we should actually know what they sound like. So we can't include bands solely from comics.
2/ We've got a bracket of 16 bands and musicians from movies and TV shows‚Äîwe picked 'em following three rules:
